name: EXPRESS SHIPPING upgrade
description:
HOLIDAY ORDERS - this may only be used until DECEMBER 19 for holiday delivery.

Add USPS express priority shipping to your order.

Select the shipping destination from the drop down menu and add to your cart. The shipping will be added as a line item in your cart.

please note: all orders ship from the United States. Select international orders if the shipping destination is not within the US or Canada. Failure to select the correct destination will delay your order.

DOMESTIC ORDERS

1 business day shipping time
22 usd


CANADIAN ORDERS

3 - 5 business day shipping time + tracking
38 usd


INTERNATIONAL ORDERS

3 - 5 business day shipping time + tracking
47 usd


PLEASE NOTE for international orders:

Any and all customs fees, duties, and taxes incurred on the package's journey will be the sole responsibility of the buyer.
All packages will be shipped with a customs form declaring the full value of the merchandise, that the item(s) is made in the USA, and declared as Merchandise (even if your order is a gift).

We cannot guarantee delivery by any certain date, as packages can (and sometimes do) take an indecipherable amount of time to be cleared by customs.

name: RUSH ORDER - add on
description:
HOLIDAY ORDERS - this listing may only be used until DECEMBER 19 for domestic orders.

use this listing to rush any personalized order

Personalized items are made to order and are made in order in which they are received.  Typically taking 7 - 10 days to be made.  

The RUSH ORDER listing puts your item in the front of the queue and your order will be made the next business day. 

+ must purchase this option for each PERSONALIZED item purchased

name: MAGIC IS SOMETHING YOU MAKE - rose gold vermeil fortune cookie bracelet
description:
Wear your fortune message wrapped around your wrist in this "charming" fortune cookie bracelet.

The fortune message reads:
MAGIC IS SOMETHING YOU MAKE


The hand stamped fortune message sits atop the wrist with a small hand formed sterling silver fortune cookie hanging at the clasp. The bracelet is rose gold plated to have a soft blush color.

  • the cookie measures approximately 1/2" (12 mm) wide x 3/8" (10 mm) tall
  • the fortune measures 1/4" wide (6 mm) x 1 1/4" long (32 mm)
  • rose gold vermeil
  • handmade s hook closure
  • bracelet length - choose from drop down menu (7" is average, and suits most women)

  • packaged in a white gift box with a white ribbon closure, ready for gift giving


SIZING

To ensure ease of putting on and taking off the bracelet, measure your wrist by wrapping either a measuring tape or string around your wrist. Add an inch to the length for a good fit. Choose your length from the drop down menu to select your size.



PREORDER ITEM

This bracelet is a PREORDER item. Please allow 3 - 4 weeks for your order to be made & beautifully packaged for you.



MORE OPTIONS

view this bracelet in SILVER
view this bracelet in GOLD

PERSONALIZE your fortune

view other FORTUNE COOKIE STYLES & FORTUNES



International customers, please be familiar with your country's taxes/duties before ordering.

Customers in Tennessee will incur 9.25% sales tax.

ROSE GOLD VERMEIL is sterling silver that has been plated with rose gold. To ensure the quality of and durability of the plating, CHRISTINA KOBER DESIGNS preplates the sterling silver with a hard metal called rhodium, which makes a stronger bond with the rose gold plating. The gold plated layer is at least 3 microns thick. Please be aware this plating will wear over time, handle your ROSE GOLD VERMEIL jewelry with care.

CHRISTINA KOBER designs | simple thoughtful handcrafted jewelry
